tags: Free Trade Agreements: Canada-Honduras, Canadian, Canada-Chile, Canada-UK, Canada-Korea, Canada-Peru, Canada-European Union, World Trade Organization, Canada-Panama, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Ukraine, Canada-Colombia
full_summary:
### [Phase 2 - ITT - 5P423-220141 - Parks Canada Agency - Caribou Conservation Breeding Facility][1]

*A Competitive Tendering Opportunity for Nonresidential Building Construction Services*

#### Invitation to Tender (ITT) Details

* **Publication Date**: December 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: January 26, 2023

#### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3619297283-Doc3631863573
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3619297283
* **Amendment Number**: 10

#### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 30, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 31, 2025
* **Delivery Regions**: Alberta

#### Tender Opportunity

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit their bids for the construction of the Caribou Conservation Breeding Facility on behalf of the Parks Canada Agency.

This tender opportunity is a competitive, traditional procurement where the lowest price will be used as the selection criterion.

The following trade agreement(s) apply to this tender:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

Please note that this tender has expired.

For more information, contact [Alison Guilford][2], Contracting Officer, Public Services and Procurement Canada, at (613) 990-1241 or [alison.guilford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][3].
